tutorial.speak:
This tutorial will show you how to make automated tasks in Chums. This feature is great if you want to set up a task that will repeat itself over time. For instance sending birthday cards to a certain group of people. Let’s begin at the Chums dashboard.
Click on “Dashboard” and navigate down to Serving.
In the serving portal click on Tasks.
Click on automations
Click the plus sign to create a new automated task
Give the task a title
Choose how often you want the task to repeat.
Add conditions
After you add the Condition type, and Operator click save. Add as many conditions as you like.
Click on the Automated Task to view the Automation Details
To manage your automated tasks just click on the title
